entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, McCreary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 p.m. CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
